Last night I tested positive for COVID-19 and am experiencing mild symptoms. I am grateful to have received both vaccinations and the booster shot and looking forward to a full and speedy recovery.This is a good reminder to protect yourself by getting vaccinated and boosted!

I've heard from families in Alabama who are being forced to drive hours to find infant formula. Today I'm joining @HouseDemocrats in voting to get the FDA the resources needed to address this shortage. We must ensure families ALWAYS have access to safe formula. #FeedOurInfants

Too many of my constituents face real barriers as they try to access their #SocialSecurity and disability benefits.During today's hearing I discussed the need for navigators & advocates to help the most vulnerable members of our community get the benefits they rightly deserve.
